name: Vintage Hanging Planter Round-PALE PINK
description:
This is a vintage light fixture with a light pink tone.  The planter base is a vintage light fixture.  The hangers are made of multi-colored beading.  The crystals were added as decorative accents.  You could also them as Candle Holders or Bird Feeders.

We have three light fixtures available to purchase.  You may buy them as is, or if you prefer we will craft them into hanging planters for you!

PRICE: $20.00

If you request to have them beaded and finished an additional $15.00 will be invoiced to you through PayPal.  Payable upon completion due prior to shipment.

Once the final payment is received the item will be shipped within 24 hours. 

*The other pictures are examples of other finished light fixtures.

name: Vintage Christmas Afghan (SPECIAL ORDER)
description:
Christmas Ideas  Magazine Â© - 1979

You may specify your color scheme (Please send mailto:fyc@finishyourcrafts.com for color combination request.)

Unique hand knitted afghan.  This is a large pattern and would fit the top of a double bed.

PRICING:
Total price for completed afghan is $425.00
$212.50 deposit due at time of order and the balance of $212.50 payable upon completion due prior to shipment.

SPECIAL ORDER INSTRUCTIONS:
A 50% deposit is required at the time of the order and the balance will paid upon completion.  I will send you an invoice through PayPal for the balance.  Once the final payment is received the afghan will be shipped within 24 hours.
Please allow up to six weeks for the construction and delivery due to the size and unique pattern of this afghan.

Because this is a SPECIAL ORDER ITEM there are no refunds.

name: Garden Theme Quilt - Lap Quilt, Table Topper, or Picnic Blanket Multi-Colored, Green & Black
description:
Garden Theme Quilt - Lap Quilt, Table Topper, or Picnic Blanket

This lovely handcrafted Garden inspired quilt is a one of kind design!

A great size to use as a table cloth, personal throw, or picnic blanket.

100% high quality cotton fabrics. Machine quilted with a long-arm machine with a cloud motif. The binding is hand finished.

Backing fabric is a lovely variegated dark green and black durable cotton.

The sashing is black corduroy, which also adds strength and durability!

Batting is Cotton Blend with a low to medium loft.

Gently washed for that ultra soft vintage crinkly look and feel!


Other uses: Couch Throw, Guest Blanket, Out Door Table Cover Decor, Great Gift Idea!

-------------------
Specifications:
-------------------

Dimension:
51" x 51"

----------------
Care instruction
----------------

Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, and tumble dry low setting or line dry for best results.
